title: Watch mode shows complete modal after task rejection
description:
When running ticker in watch mode and a human rejects a task:

Reproduction:
1. Task y1m had requires=approval, agent completed it, routed to human  
2. Human ran: tk reject y1m "Please add timestamps"
3. Task returned to agent queue (awaiting=null, status=in_progress)
4. tk next lyo correctly returns y1m as next ready task
5. BUT ticker showed 'complete' modal: 'Epic completed successfully, 1/5 completed'

Expected: Watch mode should detect y1m became available again and continue processing.

Actual: Watch mode thinks epic is complete. Shows '1/5 completed' even though y1m is ready.

Screenshot shows:
- Signal: COMPLETE  
- Tasks: 1/5 completed
- But y1m is in_progress with awaiting=null (should be picked up)

Root cause hypothesis:
- tk next may not be finding y1m because it's in_progress (not open)?
- Or watch mode polling doesn't re-check after rejection clears awaiting
